diff_act: 2.provide backup power for a minimum duration as specified by system requirements
3.Ensure all operational steps can be taken to secure data during power-related incidents.
4.Preserve the integrity of the system during power-related incidents.

regen.absent_element: reporting remaining backup power time during an outage
regen.new_specification: The UPS devices shall notify the CMCS of the remaining backup power time during a power outage.

regen.absent_element: notification of remaining backup power time
regen.new_specification: The UPS devices shall notify the CMCS with details of the remaining backup power time whenever a power outage is detected.

regen.new_specification: The UPS devices shall notify the CMCS of the remaining backup power time during power outages.

label: The UPS shall keep the CMCS apprised of time remaining on backup power when a power outage has occurred.
